There is no clear anomaly detected based on the provided data. The used memory percentage has been fluctuating between 55% and 60%, which could be normal depending on the system's workload. Since there are no apparent anomalies, recommendations would primarily involve monitoring the memory usage to ensure it remains within acceptable limits.
